name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Trump came within one vote of succeeding until John McCain’s infamous thumbs-down. And I remember that vividly because I was up at 1:30 in the morning watching it live on f**king C-SPAN like the rest of the country, nervously pacing in my apartment and chain-smoking Parliaments until I remembered emphysema wouldn’t be covered if Trump repealed Obamacare.

name: Seth Meyers

name: Seth Meyers

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: If you ask someone a straightforward question and then say I’m focused on the future,’ that’s how you know you’re caught in a lie.
